explanation: [0-0] An index finger and middle finger are positioned above a white heater containing black liquid. The heater is placed on a countertop, and a blue frame structure can be seen in the background. The white heater has the words "INTER" and "wax heater" in white, and "KV" in black.
[0-2] The index and middle fingers are dipped into the black liquid and then lifted out.
[0-2] The index and middle fingers are dipped into the black liquid and then lifted out.

[2-4] The scene shifts to a barbershop. A young man in a white shirt sits on a stool, looking forward. A young man in a red shirt stands behind him, leaning forward slightly. He raises his right hand, positioning it above the head of the man in white, revealing black liquid stuck to his index and middle fingers. The man in red then rotates his fingers with the black liquid, smiling cheerfully.

[2-4] The scene shifts to a barbershop. A young man in a white shirt sits on a stool, looking forward. A young man in a red shirt stands behind him, leaning forward slightly. He raises his right hand, positioning it above the head of the man in white, revealing black liquid stuck to his index and middle fingers. The man in red then rotates his fingers with the black liquid, smiling cheerfully.

[4-14] The man in red moves to the left, brushing the hair away from the forehead of the man in white with his left hand and placing his right hand near the man's nose. As the man in red moves left, other people getting haircuts become visible in the background. The mirrors have purple frames, and numerous lights illuminate the room. The man in red spreads his right-hand fingers and inserts his index and middle fingers into the nostrils of the man in white. He pushes the nose upward slightly, causing the man in white to close his eyes. The man in red shifts his body to the right, opens his mouth wide in laughter, and looks forward. He then pushes the nose of the man in white upward, causing his head to tilt back. Suddenly, he pulls his fingers out of the man's nostrils, revealing remnants of black liquid. The man in white then lowers his head.
